verses.verse: The Revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> Him to show <S%G1166><s%> to His bond-servants, the things which <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> shortly <S%G5034><s%> take <S%G1096><s%> place; <S%G1096><s%> and He sent <S%G649><s%> and communicated <S%G4591><s%> [it] by His angel <S%G32><s%> to His bond-servant John, <S%G2491><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> bore <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> to the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and to the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> [even] to all <S%G3745><s%> that he saw. <S%G3708><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he who reads <S%G314><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who hear <S%G191><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of the prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> and heed <S%G5083><s%> the things which are written <S%G1125><s%> in it; for the time <S%G2540><s%> is near. <S%G1451><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> that are in Asia: <S%G773><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from Him who is and who was and who is to come; <S%G2064><s%> and from the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> are before <S%G1799><s%> His throne; <S%G2362><s%>

and from Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the faithful <S%G4103><s%> witness, <S%G3144><s%> the first-born of the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and the ruler <S%G758><s%> of the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%> To Him who loves <S%G25><s%> us, and released <S%G3089><s%> us from our sins <S%G266><s%> by His blood, <S%G129><s%>

and He has made <S%G4160><s%> us [to be] a kingdom, <S%G932><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> to His God <S%G2316><s%> and Father; <S%G3962><s%> to Him [be] the glory <S%G1391><s%> and the dominion <S%G2904><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> He is coming <S%G2064><s%> with the clouds, <S%G3507><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> will see <S%G3708><s%> Him, even <S%G2532><s%> those who <S%G3748><s%> pierced <S%G1574><s%> Him; and all <S%G3956><s%> the tribes <S%G5443><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> will mourn <S%G2875><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> Him. Even <S%G3483><s%> so. <S%G3483><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

" I am <S%G1510><s%> the Alpha <S%G7008><s%> and the Omega <S%G5598><s%> ," says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> "who is and who <S%G3588><s%> was and who is to come, <S%G2064><s%> the Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>"

I, John, <S%G2491><s%> your brother <S%G80><s%> and fellow <S%G4791><s%> partaker <S%G4791><s%> in the tribulation <S%G2347><s%> and kingdom <S%G932><s%> and perseverance <S%G5281><s%> [which are] in Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> was on the island <S%G3520><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Patmos, <S%G3963><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

I was in the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> on the Lord's day, <S%G2250><s%> and I heard <S%G191><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> me a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> [the sound] of a trumpet, <S%G4536><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Write <S%G1125><s%> in a book <S%G975><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you see, <S%G991><s%> and send <S%G3992><s%> [it] to the seven <S%G2033><s%> churches: <S%G1577><s%> to Ephesus <S%G2181><s%> and to Smyrna <S%G4667><s%> and to Pergamum <S%G4010><s%> and to Thyatira <S%G2363><s%> and to Sardis <S%G4554><s%> and to Philadelphia <S%G5359><s%> and to Laodicea. <S%G2993><s%>"

And I turned <S%G1994><s%> to see <S%G991><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> that was speaking <S%G2980><s%> with me. And having turned <S%G1994><s%> I saw <S%G3708><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> lampstands; <S%G3087><s%>

and in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the lampstands <S%G3087><s%> one <S%G3664><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> clothed <S%G1746><s%> in a robe <S%G4158><s%> reaching <S%G4158><s%> to the feet, <S%G4158><s%> and girded <S%G4024><s%> across <S%G4314><s%> His breast <S%G3149><s%> with a golden <S%G5552><s%> girdle. <S%G2223><s%>

And His head <S%G2776><s%> and His hair <S%G2359><s%> were white <S%G3022><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> wool, <S%G2053><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> snow; <S%G5510><s%> and His eyes <S%G3788><s%> were like <S%G5613><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire; <S%G4442><s%>

and His feet <S%G4228><s%> [were] like <S%G3664><s%> burnished <S%G5474><s%> bronze, <S%G5474><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> it has been caused <S%G4448><s%> to glow <S%G4448><s%> in a furnace, <S%G2575><s%> and His voice <S%G5456><s%> [was] like <S%G5613><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters. <S%G5204><s%>

And in His right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> He held <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> stars; <S%G792><s%> and out of His mouth <S%G4750><s%> came <S%G1607><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> two-edged sword; <S%G4501><s%> and His face <S%G3799><s%> was like <S%G5613><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> shining <S%G5316><s%> in its strength. <S%G1411><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> I saw <S%G3708><s%> Him, I fell <S%G4098><s%> at His feet <S%G4228><s%> as a dead <S%G3498><s%> man. <S%G3498><s%> And He laid <S%G5087><s%> His right <S%G1188><s%> hand <S%G1188><s%> upon me, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Do not be afraid; <S%G5399><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> and the last, <S%G2078><s%>

and the living <S%G2198><s%> One; and I was dead, <S%G3498><s%> and behold, <S%G2400><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> forevermore, <S%G165><s%> and I have <S%G2192><s%> the keys <S%G2807><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> and of Hades. <S%G86><s%>

"Write <S%G1125><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> you have seen, <S%G3708><s%> and the things which <S%G3739><s%> are, and the things which <S%G3739><s%> shall take <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>

"As for the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G3708><s%> in My right <S%G1188><s%> hand, <S%G1188><s%> and the seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> lampstands: <S%G3087><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> are the angels <S%G32><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> churches, <S%G1577><s%> and the seven <S%G2033><s%> lampstands <S%G3087><s%> are the seven <S%G2033><s%> churches. <S%G1577><s%>
